attributes.action: Student nurses and other medical students should get free parking on placement
attributes.additional_details:
Please take a minute to read the article link — 

http://www.theladbible.com/community/uk-student-nurse-leaves-note-on-her-car-after-being-targeted-by-vandals-20190212?c=1550054588888

Our future nurses and medical stuff deserve so much more respect considering they do full time placement ( unpaid) alongside full time university! Running a car is expensive in general but having to pay out funds to fix up your car due to it being vandalised is not okay !! Please take a few moments to sign this petition
attributes.background: Parking should be made free for students. Alongside having to go placements, students have to struggle with fees of parking which can be a large amount depending how many hours they have to be on placement that day and where it is located . This creates a lot of  inconvenience .
